str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From hupo and meno; to stay under, i.e. Remain; figuratively, to undergo, i.e. Bear, have fortitude, persevere.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To reign together with. From sun and basileuo; to be co-regent.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 1st Person Plural
str2: Perhaps from a and the middle voice of rheo; to contradict, i.e. Disavow, reject, abnegate.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Perhaps from a and the middle voice of rheo; to contradict, i.e. Disavow, reject, abnegate.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
